title: The PlayStation 5 UI is Finally Here! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.15.20
description:
SanchoWest joins Blessing to talk about the reveal of the PS5 User interface, Xbox Series X's launch lineup, and more!

 Twitter.com/SanchoWest
http://youtube.com/sanchowest
http://twitch.tv/sanchowest http://Instagram.com/sanchowest

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:08 - Housekeeping
We’re doing Untitled Goose Game Co-Op right after KFGD today, but…
We’ve partnered with Joe Biden’s campaign to debut the official Biden Island in Animal Crossing New Horizons tomorrow, Friday at 11 am pt. Join Greg as he checks out what the team’s come up with in game.
After the Biden Island stream, I’m playing Ghost of Tsushima Legends with Greg.
Donktober continues this Saturday. Join me and Barrett as we play through the entirety of Donkey Kong 64 culminating in a finale ending on Halloween that we are officially dubbing “Donkoween”. That’s happening this Saturday at 12 noon Pacific time on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Tom Bock
Mohammed Mohammed
Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:21 - The PlayStation 5 UI has finally been revealed!
00:16:28 - “What are your thoughts on the PS5 UI reveal?” - Brittney Taylor
00:22:36 - “What weight do you think the UI of next gen carries in that decision making process of which console to buy?” - MangoJR
00:26:27 - Let’s talk about PlayStation Parties
00:37:55 - The Xbox Series X full launch lineup has been revealed
00:43:50 - Spider-Man: Miles Morales lets you use a bodega cat as a weapon
00:47:18 -  Upstart
00:48:46 - Doordash
00:50:34 - Bespoke
00:52:06 - What’s on Sancho’s Mind?
00:58:44 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:59:59 - “Are us ps5 digital version owners in trouble on day one?” - Austin M.
01:02:57 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter - Discord / Destiny on PC - https://discord.gg/turbotaxinspace 
01:04:23 - You‘re Wrong
01:08:36 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Elaine Gomez
